com.guardtime.ksi.unisignature.verifier.rules

Interface Rule

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AggregationChainInputHashVerificationRule, AggregationHashChainConsistencyRule, AggregationHashChainIndexConsistencyRule, AggregationHashChainLinkMetadataRule, AggregationHashChainTimeConsistencyRule, BaseRule, CalendarAuthenticationRecordAggregationHashRule, CalendarAuthenticationRecordAggregationTimeRule, CalendarAuthenticationRecordExistenceRule, CalendarAuthenticationRecordSignatureVerificationRule, CalendarHashChainAggregationTimeRule, CalendarHashChainDoesNotExistRule, CalendarHashChainExistenceRule, CalendarHashChainInputHashVerificationRule, CalendarHashChainRegistrationTimeRule, CertificateExistenceRule, CompositeRule, DocumentHashVerificationRule, ExtendedSignatureCalendarChainAggregationTimeRule, ExtendedSignatureCalendarChainInputHashRule, ExtendedSignatureCalendarChainRootHashRule, ExtendedSignatureCalendarHashChainRightLinksMatchesRule, ExtendingPermittedVerificationRule, PublicationsFileContainsPublicationRule, PublicationsFileContainsSignaturePublicationRule, PublicationsFileExtendedSignatureInputHashRule, PublicationsFilePublicationHashMatchesExtenderResponseRule, PublicationsFilePublicationTimeMatchesExtenderResponseRule, Rfc3161RecordIndexRule, Rfc3161RecordTimeRule, SignatureDoesNotContainPublicationRule, SignaturePublicationRecordExistenceRule, SignaturePublicationRecordPublicationHashRule, SignaturePublicationRecordPublicationTimeRule, UserProvidedPublicationCreationTimeVerificationRule, UserProvidedPublicationExistenceRule, UserProvidedPublicationExtendedSignatureInputHashRule, UserProvidedPublicationHashEqualsToSignaturePublicationHashRule, UserProvidedPublicationHashMatchesExtendedResponseRule, UserProvidedPublicationTimeEqualsToSignaturePublicationTimeRule, UserProvidedPublicationTimeMatchesExtendedResponseRule, UserProvidedPublicationTimeNotEqualToSignaturePublicationTimeRule

    public interface Rule
    Rule contains one logical step of signature verification policy. Rules are reusable and can be used by multiple different policies. Rules are registered in the Policy and will be executed by SignatureVerifier
    See Also:
    Policy, SignatureVerifier

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      RuleResult verify(VerificationContext context)
      Method for verifying the signature.

      • verify

        RuleResult verify(VerificationContext context)
           throws KSIException
        Method for verifying the signature.
        Parameters:
        context - context to be used for this rule for verification.
        Returns:
        rule result
        Throws:
        KSIException - if exception occures.
